Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
20.02.2013 SH SCR17957 Added GSET_YESNO(6666) to trigger the new/old version to populate STIC/SCIC/SIIC tabels
30.06.2012 AS SCR#16352 Calling part#3 if Romania and reverse factoring, too
19.04.2011 GB SCR16390 Changed condition for call the 3. SCHEDULE_INVOICE_ICA504
18.04.2011 JOH SCR16366 Replaced GB002 BY GB902
13.05.2008 SH SCR13604 Added deleteion of ICFU
12.03.2008 CHP SCR#13467 Values added to SIIC
16.01.2008 SH SCR13291 Added PI.LOCALDATE, PI.LOCALTIME to adjust system
date/time acc. to timezones --> updates STIC
-- If PI.IFIL_ID > 0 then called from website, else leave program immed
-- Totals on currency level (uses to store SCIC)
-- Totals on schedule level (uses to store STIC)
-- Totals on client level (uses to store ICFU)
-- 4. SCHEDULE_INVOICE_ICA504 (This module has to select NFIN again
because of different sort on NFIN)
-- 6. NEW_FILE_INVOICE_RUN
-- Reset variables
-- 5. ICA_TMP_FILE_UPLOAD (prepare variables for G.S. where ICFU will
stored
(Info: If step 5 will be removed in the future then the group level on client
could be remved and the updates on v.NFIN_ADMNO, v.NFIN_CLNTNO
have to be moved to group level NFIN_SCHTNOCLI)
-- 5. ICA_TMP_FILE_UPLOAD
-- Reset variables
-- 1. IdentifySchedules
... calculate unique NFIN_STIC_ID on NFIN_ADMNO / NFIN_CLNTNO /
NFIN_SCHTNOCLI level
-- 2. Populate SCHEDULE_TOTAL_ICA504 (prepare variables for G.S. where STIC will
be populated, after calc of totals)
2. Populate SCHEDULE_TOTAL_ICA504
-- Reset variables
-- 3. Populate SCHEDULE_CURRENCY_ICA504 (prepare variables for G.S. where SCIC
will be populated, after calc of totals)
-- 3. Populate SCHEDULE_CURRENCY_ICA504
-- Calc totals for 2. Populate SCHEDULE_TOTAL_ICA504
-- Calc totals for 5. ICA_TMP_FILE_UPLOAD
1. IdentifySchedules
-- Calc totals for 3. Populate SCHEDULE_CURRENCY_ICA504

SQL_STMT_U.val: select NFIN_ADMNO, NFIN_CLNTNO, NFIN_SCHTNOCLI from :1/NFIN where NFIN_NFIR_NO = :2 group by NFIN_ADMNO, NFIN_CLNTNO, NFIN_SCHTNOCLI order by NFIN_ADMNO, NFIN_CLNTNO, NFIN_SCHTNOCLI for fetch only

Text.val: -- Selection distinct NFIN_ADMNO / NFIN_CLNTNO / NFIN_SCHTNOCLI
-- Virtuals used for schedule level
-- Virtuals used for client level
-- Set/reset variables
-- Reset variables
... calculate unique NFIN_STIC_ID
-- 2. Populate SCHEDULE_TOTAL_ICA504 (prepare variables for G.S. where STIC will be populated, after calc of totals)
3. Populate SCIC (separately for debit/credit)

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/NFIN set NFIN_STIC_ID = :2 where NFIN_NFIR_NO = :3 and NFIN_ADMNO = :4 and NFIN_CLNTNO = :5 and NFIN_SCHTNOCLI = :6

select NFIN_INVCURRENCY, cast(sum(NFIN_INVAMOUNTI) as decimal(13,2)), count(*) as TOTAL from :1/NFIN where NFIN_NFIR_NO = :2 and NFIN_ADMNO = :3 and NFIN_CLNTNO = :4 and NFIN_SCHTNOCLI = :5 and NFIN_INVAMOUNTI :6 0 group by NFIN_INVCURRENCY order by NFIN_INVCURRENCY for fetch only

Text.val: -- Recalculation and build totals for the use in step 2 (store STIC)
-- Build totals for the use in step 5 (store IFCU)

SQL_STMT_U.val: insert into :1/SIIC (SIIC_STIC_ID, SIIC_LINENO, SIIC_INVNO, SIIC_DEBC_DEBC, SIIC_CURRENCY, SIIC_AMOUNTI, SIIC_INVDATE, SIIC_DUEDATE) select NFIN_STIC_ID, NFIN_LINENO, NFIN_INVNO, NFIN_DEBC_DEBC, NFIN_INVCURRENCY, NFIN_INVAMOUNTI, NFIN_INVDATE, NFIN_DUEDATE from :1/NFIN where NFIN_NFIR_NO = :2 order by NFIN_STIC_ID, NFIN_INVNO

Text.val: -- Declare tables used in DSQL to achieve cross reference on tables
